name: Zia and the goddesses of magic
description: In a world where magic is Queen, people lived happily and safely under the protection of the ten guardian goddesses. Out of the unknown came a powerful demon who brought trouble upon the world, and all the goddesses got captured and locked away. Zia is a little girl who lives in a village in the mountains with her parents.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 32 MB RAM Storage: 55 MB available space
